turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Château d'Apremont-sur-Allier.
turn.2: Château d'Apremont-sur-Allier The Château d'Apremont-sur-Allier is a historic castle in Apremont-sur-Allier, France.
turn.4: Built in the second half of the 15th century, the castle has five towers.
turn.6: By the 17th century, another story had been added.
turn.7: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.8: At the beginning of the 19th century, stables were built.
turn.10: In the 1930s, the castle was inherited by Antoinette de Saint-Sauveur, wife of Eugène Schneider, II.
turn.11: Was anyone else living in the castle?
turn.12: From 1934 to 1942, a Mr. de Galéa restored it in the Gothic Revival architectural style.
